description: Menu page displays all available food items
steps: Navigate to /menu page
Verify page heading 'Our Menu' or similar is displayed
Verify food items are displayed in a grid layout
Verify each item shows image, name, description, and price
Verify items are organized by category (Mains, Sides, Desserts, Drinks)

description: Food items can be filtered by category
steps: Navigate to /menu page
Verify category filter tabs or buttons are displayed
Click on 'Mains' category
Verify only main dishes are shown
Click on 'Sides' category
Verify only side dishes are shown
Click 'All' to show all items again

description: Food items can be searched by name
steps: Navigate to /menu page
Verify search input is displayed
Type 'mac' into search field
Verify results filter to show matching items (e.g., Mac & Cheese)
Clear search field
Verify all items are shown again

description: Individual food item page shows full details
steps: Navigate to /menu page
Click on a food item card
Verify navigation to /menu/[item-slug] page
Verify large item image is displayed
Verify item name and full description
Verify price is prominently displayed
Verify nutritional information if available
Verify allergen warnings if applicable
Verify 'Add to Cart' button is present
Navigate to /menu page
Verify available items show 'Add to Cart' button
Verify sold out items show 'Sold Out' badge
Verify sold out items have disabled add button
Verify limited availability items show remaining count

description: Quick add to cart from menu grid
steps: Navigate to /menu page
Hover over a food item card
Verify quick-add button appears
Click quick-add button
Verify item is added to cart
Verify cart icon updates with item count
Verify success toast notification
Navigate to item detail page for customizable item
Verify customization options are displayed (e.g., spice level, size)
Select customization options
Verify price updates if options affect price
Add to cart with customizations
Verify cart shows item with selected options
Navigate to /menu page
Verify dietary filter options (Vegetarian, Vegan, Gluten-Free)
Toggle 'Vegetarian' filter
Verify only vegetarian items are displayed
Verify filter state persists when navigating categories
View /menu page on mobile viewport (375px)
Verify items display in single column or 2-column grid
Verify search and filters are accessible
View on tablet (768px)
Verify 2-3 column grid layout
View on desktop (1200px)
Verify 3-4 column grid layout

description: Food item cards have appealing hover effects
steps: Navigate to /menu page on desktop
Hover over food item card
Verify card lifts with subtle shadow
Verify image slightly scales up
Verify transition is smooth (200-300ms)
Navigate to /menu page
Toggle dark mode
Verify background adapts to warm dark tones
Verify food images remain vibrant
Verify text contrast is maintained
Verify price and category badges remain visible
Navigate to /menu page
Verify all food images have descriptive alt text
Verify filter buttons are keyboard accessible
Verify item cards can be navigated via keyboard
Verify screen reader announces item name, price, and availability
Verify focus indicators are visible
Navigate to /menu page
Verify images use next/image optimization
Verify images lazy load as user scrolls
Verify placeholder/blur shown while images load
Verify no layout shift when images load
